address2: 13th Floor Wisdom Plaza Qiaoxiang Road, Nanshan District
longBusinessSummary: Huahui Education Group Limited, a professional management coaching organization, provides education services. It is involved in the researching, developing, and applying methods for helping individuals to enhance their personal and professional leadership skills and effectiveness; and cultural exchange event planning, conference planning, corporate image planning, marketing planning, exhibition planning, stage lighting, leasing, door-to-door integration of multimedia teaching systems installation, on-site maintenance, and domestic trade and import and export of goods and technologies, as well as education information consulting and enterprise management consulting. The company serves real estate, high technology, medicine, health, schools, agencies, auto, communications, logistics, robotics, property, construction, engineering, manufacturing, textile, rag trade, furniture, and other fields, as well as governments. Huahui Education Group Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Huahui Education Group Limited is a subsidiary of Feier Co. Limited.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Qing  Zuo
companyOfficers.title: General Manager of Zhongdehui (Shenzhen) Education Development Co., Limited
